entry.em: ..ICE STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST MONDAY

entry.data:
FREEZING RAIN WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SLEET
LITTLE OR NO SLEET ACCUMULATION
NEW ICE ACCUMULATION OF A TENTH TO ONE QUARTER OF AN INCH
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE AROUND 30
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH
CHANCE OF PRECIPITATION NEAR 100 PERCENT

FREEZING DRIZZLE AND SNOW SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE EVENING, THEN SNOW SHOWERS, A SLIGHT CHANCE OF FREEZING RAIN AND FREEZING DRIZZLE AFTER MIDNIGHT
SNOW ACCUMULATION OF 1 TO 3 INCHES
ICE ACCUMULATION OF UP TO A TENTH OF AN INCH
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S
NORTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH
CHANCE OF PRECIPITATION 90 PERCENT

CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SNOW SHOWERS IN THE MORNING
NEW SNOW ACCUMULATION UP TO 1 INCH POSSIBLE
HIGHS IN THE MID 20S
NORTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH
CHANCE OF SNOW 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 11
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH, DIMINISHING TO AROUND 5 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 20S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
COLD WITH LOWS 5 TO 10 ABOVE

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS AROUND 20
LOWS ZERO TO 5 ABOVE ZERO

MOSTLY CLOUDY AND NOT AS COOL
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 20S

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 40 PERCENT CHANCE OF SNOW SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 30S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 30S
